title: Breadth-First Search vs. Restarting Random Walks for Escaping Uninformed Heuristic Regions
summary: Greedy search methods like Greedy Best-First Search (GBFS) and Enforced Hill-Climbing (EHC) often struggle when faced with Uninformed Heuristic Regions (UHRs) like heuristic local minima or plateaus. In this work, we theoretically and empirically compare two popular methods for escaping UHRs in breadth-first search (BrFS) and restarting random walks (RRWs). We first derive the expected runtime of escaping a UHR using BrFS and RRWs, based on properties of the UHR and the random walk procedure, and then use these results to identify when RRWs will be faster in expectation than BrFS. We then evaluate these methods for escaping UHRs by comparing standard EHC, which uses BrFS to escape UHRs, to variants of EHC called EHC-RRW, which use RRWs for that purpose. EHC-RRW is shown to have strong expected runtime guarantees in cases where EHC has previously been shown to be effective. We also run experiments with these approaches on PDDL planning benchmarks to better understand their relative effectiveness for escaping UHRs.

AI.tldr: 本文理论和经验地比较了两种逃离无信息启发区域（UHRs）的方法：广度优先搜索（BrFS）和重启随机游走（RRWs），并发现RRWs在特定情况下比BrFS更快，且基于RRWs的Enforced Hill-Climbing变体（EHC-RRW）表现出强大的预期运行时保证。
AI.motivation: 贪婪搜索方法（如GBFS和EHC）在遇到无信息启发区域（UHRs），例如启发式局部最小值或高原时，性能不佳，因此需要更有效的方法来逃离这些区域。
AI.method: 1. 理论推导了使用BrFS和RRWs逃离UHRs的预期运行时，基于UHR特性和随机游走过程。2. 利用这些结果识别了RRWs在何时预期上比BrFS更快。3. 将使用BrFS逃离UHRs的标准EHC与使用RRWs的EHC变体（EHC-RRW）进行了比较。4. 在PDDL规划基准上对这些方法进行了实验评估。
AI.result: 1. 成功推导了BrFS和RRWs逃离UHRs的预期运行时。2. 识别出了RRWs预期上比BrFS更快的条件。3. EHC-RRW在EHC已被证明有效的场景中表现出强大的预期运行时保证。4. 在PDDL规划基准上的实验提供了关于这些方法逃离UHRs相对有效性的深入理解。
AI.conclusion: RRWs可以作为一种更快且有效的逃离无信息启发区域的方法，尤其当集成到Enforced Hill-Climbing（EHC-RRW）中时，它能提供强大的运行时保证，并在规划问题中展现出实际优势。

title: Robust and Diverse Multi-Agent Learning via Rational Policy Gradient
summary: Adversarial optimization algorithms that explicitly search for flaws in agents' policies have been successfully applied to finding robust and diverse policies in multi-agent settings. However, the success of adversarial optimization has been largely limited to zero-sum settings because its naive application in cooperative settings leads to a critical failure mode: agents are irrationally incentivized to self-sabotage, blocking the completion of tasks and halting further learning. To address this, we introduce Rationality-preserving Policy Optimization (RPO), a formalism for adversarial optimization that avoids self-sabotage by ensuring agents remain rational--that is, their policies are optimal with respect to some possible partner policy. To solve RPO, we develop Rational Policy Gradient (RPG), which trains agents to maximize their own reward in a modified version of the original game in which we use opponent shaping techniques to optimize the adversarial objective. RPG enables us to extend a variety of existing adversarial optimization algorithms that, no longer subject to the limitations of self-sabotage, can find adversarial examples, improve robustness and adaptability, and learn diverse policies. We empirically validate that our approach achieves strong performance in several popular cooperative and general-sum environments. Our project page can be found at https://rational-policy-gradient.github.io.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为“理性保持策略优化”（RPO）的新框架，以及相应的“理性策略梯度”（RPG）算法，旨在将对抗性优化成功应用于合作性多智能体环境，避免智能体自毁行为。
AI.motivation: 对抗性优化在零和博弈中表现出色，但在合作环境中直接应用会导致智能体“自毁”——不合理地阻碍任务完成和学习。因此，需要一种机制来在合作设置中应用对抗性优化，同时确保智能体保持理性。
AI.method: 引入了“理性保持策略优化”（RPO）框架，确保智能体策略对其潜在伙伴策略保持最优，从而避免自毁。为解决RPO，开发了“理性策略梯度”（RPG）算法，该算法通过在修改后的游戏中训练智能体最大化自身奖励，并利用对手塑造技术来优化对抗性目标。
AI.result: RPG成功地将多种现有对抗性优化算法扩展到合作和一般和环境，不再受自毁限制。它能够发现对抗性示例，提高策略的鲁棒性和适应性，并学习多样化策略。经验验证表明，该方法在多个流行的合作和一般和环境中取得了强大的性能。
AI.conclusion: RPO和RPG成功解决了对抗性优化在合作环境中自毁的问题，通过确保智能体保持理性，使其能够有效地应用于发现对抗性示例、增强鲁棒性和学习多样化策略，并在实践中表现出色。

title: Assessing the Capabilities of LLMs in Humor:A Multi-dimensional Analysis of Oogiri Generation and Evaluation
summary: Computational humor is a frontier for creating advanced and engaging natural language processing (NLP) applications, such as sophisticated dialogue systems. While previous studies have benchmarked the humor capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs), they have often relied on single-dimensional evaluations, such as judging whether something is simply ``funny.'' This paper argues that a multifaceted understanding of humor is necessary and addresses this gap by systematically evaluating LLMs through the lens of Oogiri, a form of Japanese improvisational comedy games. To achieve this, we expanded upon existing Oogiri datasets with data from new sources and then augmented the collection with Oogiri responses generated by LLMs. We then manually annotated this expanded collection with 5-point absolute ratings across six dimensions: Novelty, Clarity, Relevance, Intelligence, Empathy, and Overall Funniness. Using this dataset, we assessed the capabilities of state-of-the-art LLMs on two core tasks: their ability to generate creative Oogiri responses and their ability to evaluate the funniness of responses using a six-dimensional evaluation. Our results show that while LLMs can generate responses at a level between low- and mid-tier human performance, they exhibit a notable lack of Empathy. This deficit in Empathy helps explain their failure to replicate human humor assessment. Correlation analyses of human and model evaluation data further reveal a fundamental divergence in evaluation criteria: LLMs prioritize Novelty, whereas humans prioritize Empathy. We release our annotated corpus to the community to pave the way for the development of more emotionally intelligent and sophisticated conversational agents.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过日本即兴喜剧Oogiri的多维度评估，发现大型语言模型（LLMs）在幽默生成和评估方面存在对“同理心”的显著不足，且其评估标准与人类存在差异。
AI.motivation: 现有研究对LLMs幽默能力的评估通常是单维度的，例如仅判断是否“好笑”。本研究认为，对幽默需要多方面的理解，因此旨在通过多维度评估来弥补这一空白。
AI.method: 研究扩展了现有Oogiri数据集，并加入了LLM生成的Oogiri回复。然后，对这些数据进行人工标注，采用5分制对“新颖性”、“清晰度”、“相关性”、“智力”、“同理心”和“整体趣味性”六个维度进行评分。利用此数据集，评估了LLMs在生成创意Oogiri回复和基于六维度评估回复趣味性两项核心任务上的能力。
AI.result: 结果显示，LLMs生成的回复水平介于人类低级和中级表现之间，但显著缺乏“同理心”。这种同理心不足解释了它们未能复制人类幽默评估的原因。人类和模型评估数据的相关性分析揭示了评估标准的根本分歧：LLMs优先考虑“新颖性”，而人类则优先考虑“同理心”。
AI.conclusion: LLMs在幽默生成和评估中缺乏同理心，这限制了它们复制人类幽默判断的能力。为开发更具情感智能和复杂性的对话代理，研究者发布了所标注的数据集。

title: FGM-HD: Boosting Generation Diversity of Fractal Generative Models through Hausdorff Dimension Induction
summary: Improving the diversity of generated results while maintaining high visual quality remains a significant challenge in image generation tasks. Fractal Generative Models (FGMs) are efficient in generating high-quality images, but their inherent self-similarity limits the diversity of output images. To address this issue, we propose a novel approach based on the Hausdorff Dimension (HD), a widely recognized concept in fractal geometry used to quantify structural complexity, which aids in enhancing the diversity of generated outputs. To incorporate HD into FGM, we propose a learnable HD estimation method that predicts HD directly from image embeddings, addressing computational cost concerns. However, simply introducing HD into a hybrid loss is insufficient to enhance diversity in FGMs due to: 1) degradation of image quality, and 2) limited improvement in generation diversity. To this end, during training, we adopt an HD-based loss with a monotonic momentum-driven scheduling strategy to progressively optimize the hyperparameters, obtaining optimal diversity without sacrificing visual quality. Moreover, during inference, we employ HD-guided rejection sampling to select geometrically richer outputs. Extensive experiments on the ImageNet dataset demonstrate that our FGM-HD framework yields a 39\% improvement in output diversity compared to vanilla FGMs, while preserving comparable image quality. To our knowledge, this is the very first work introducing HD into FGM. Our method effectively enhances the diversity of generated outputs while offering a principled theoretical contribution to FGM development.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种基于豪斯多夫维度（HD）的新方法，FGM-HD，以显著提高分形生成模型（FGM）的输出多样性，同时保持高视觉质量。
AI.motivation: 分形生成模型（FGM）在生成高质量图像方面表现出色，但其固有的自相似性限制了输出图像的多样性。如何在不牺牲图像质量的前提下提高生成结果的多样性是一个重大挑战。
AI.method: 本研究提出将豪斯多夫维度（HD）引入FGM以量化结构复杂性，从而增强多样性。具体方法包括：1) 提出一种可学习的HD估计方法，直接从图像嵌入中预测HD，以解决计算成本问题。2) 在训练阶段，采用基于HD的损失函数，并结合单调动量驱动的调度策略逐步优化超参数，以在不牺牲视觉质量的情况下获得最佳多样性。3) 在推理阶段，采用HD引导的拒绝采样来选择几何上更丰富的输出。
AI.result: 在ImageNet数据集上的实验表明，FGM-HD框架相比于传统FGM，输出多样性提高了39%，同时保持了可比的图像质量。这是首次将HD引入FGM的工作。
AI.conclusion: 本方法有效提升了生成输出的多样性，并为FGM的发展提供了原理性的理论贡献。

title: Detecting Emotional Dynamic Trajectories: An Evaluation Framework for Emotional Support in Language Models
summary: Emotional support is a core capability in human-AI interaction, with applications including psychological counseling, role play, and companionship. However, existing evaluations of large language models (LLMs) often rely on short, static dialogues and fail to capture the dynamic and long-term nature of emotional support. To overcome this limitation, we shift from snapshot-based evaluation to trajectory-based assessment, adopting a user-centered perspective that evaluates models based on their ability to improve and stabilize user emotional states over time. Our framework constructs a large-scale benchmark consisting of 328 emotional contexts and 1,152 disturbance events, simulating realistic emotional shifts under evolving dialogue scenarios. To encourage psychologically grounded responses, we constrain model outputs using validated emotion regulation strategies such as situation selection and cognitive reappraisal. User emotional trajectories are modeled as a first-order Markov process, and we apply causally-adjusted emotion estimation to obtain unbiased emotional state tracking. Based on this framework, we introduce three trajectory-level metrics: Baseline Emotional Level (BEL), Emotional Trajectory Volatility (ETV), and Emotional Centroid Position (ECP). These metrics collectively capture user emotional dynamics over time and support comprehensive evaluation of long-term emotional support performance of LLMs. Extensive evaluations across a diverse set of LLMs reveal significant disparities in emotional support capabilities and provide actionable insights for model development.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种新的、以用户为中心的轨迹评估框架，用于衡量大型语言模型（LLMs）的长期情感支持能力，通过模拟动态情感变化、应用情感调节策略和引入新的轨迹级指标，克服了现有静态对话评估的局限性。
AI.motivation: 现有对大型语言模型情感支持能力的评估主要依赖于短时、静态对话，未能捕捉到情感支持的动态性和长期性本质，这限制了对模型真实表现的理解。
AI.method: 研究从快照式评估转向轨迹式评估，采用以用户为中心的视角。构建了一个包含328个情感语境和1,152个干扰事件的大规模基准，模拟动态情感变化。模型输出通过情境选择和认知重评等经验证的情绪调节策略进行约束。用户情感轨迹被建模为一阶马尔可夫过程，并采用因果调整的情感估计来获得无偏的情感状态追踪。引入了三个轨迹级指标：基线情绪水平（BEL）、情绪轨迹波动性（ETV）和情绪质心位置（ECP）。
AI.result: 对多种大型语言模型进行的广泛评估揭示了它们在情感支持能力上存在显著差异。
AI.conclusion: 该框架能够全面评估大型语言模型的长期情感支持性能，并为模型开发提供了可操作的见解。

title: DoPE: Denoising Rotary Position Embedding
summary: Rotary Position Embedding (RoPE) in Transformer models has inherent limits that weaken length extrapolation. We reinterpret the attention map with positional encoding as a noisy feature map, and propose Denoising Positional Encoding (DoPE), a training-free method based on truncated matrix entropy to detect outlier frequency bands in the feature map. Leveraging the noise characteristics of the feature map, we further reparameterize it with a parameter-free Gaussian distribution to achieve robust extrapolation. Our method theoretically reveals the underlying cause of the attention sink phenomenon and its connection to truncated matrix entropy. Experiments on needle-in-a-haystack and many-shot in-context learning tasks demonstrate that DoPE significantly improves retrieval accuracy and reasoning stability across extended contexts (up to 64K tokens). The results show that the denoising strategy for positional embeddings effectively mitigates attention sinks and restores balanced attention patterns, providing a simple yet powerful solution for improving length generalization. Our project page is Project: https://The-physical-picture-of-LLMs.github.io

AI.tldr: 针对旋转位置嵌入（RoPE）的长度外推限制，本文提出Denoising Positional Encoding (DoPE)，一个基于截断矩阵熵的无训练方法，通过去噪注意力特征图来显著提高Transformer在长上下文中的检索准确性和推理稳定性。
AI.motivation: Transformer模型中的旋转位置嵌入（RoPE）存在固有局限性，削弱了其长度外推能力。
AI.method: 本文将带有位置编码的注意力图重新解释为噪声特征图，并提出Denoising Positional Encoding (DoPE)。DoPE是一种无训练方法，它基于截断矩阵熵来检测特征图中的异常频率带。此外，该方法利用特征图的噪声特性，通过无参数高斯分布对其进行重新参数化，以实现鲁棒外推。理论上，DoPE还揭示了注意力沉没现象的根本原因及其与截断矩阵熵的关联。
AI.result: 在“大海捞针”（needle-in-a-haystack）和多样本上下文学习任务上的实验表明，DoPE显著提高了在扩展上下文（高达64K tokens）中的检索准确性和推理稳定性。结果显示，位置嵌入的去噪策略有效缓解了注意力沉没现象，并恢复了平衡的注意力模式。
AI.conclusion: DoPE提供了一个简单而强大的解决方案，通过去噪位置嵌入来改善长度泛化能力，有效缓解注意力沉没现象并恢复平衡的注意力模式。

title: UMIGen: A Unified Framework for Egocentric Point Cloud Generation and Cross-Embodiment Robotic Imitation Learning
summary: Data-driven robotic learning faces an obvious dilemma: robust policies demand large-scale, high-quality demonstration data, yet collecting such data remains a major challenge owing to high operational costs, dependence on specialized hardware, and the limited spatial generalization capability of current methods. The Universal Manipulation Interface (UMI) relaxes the strict hardware requirements for data collection, but it is restricted to capturing only RGB images of a scene and omits the 3D geometric information on which many tasks rely. Inspired by DemoGen, we propose UMIGen, a unified framework that consists of two key components: (1) Cloud-UMI, a handheld data collection device that requires no visual SLAM and simultaneously records point cloud observation-action pairs; and (2) a visibility-aware optimization mechanism that extends the DemoGen pipeline to egocentric 3D observations by generating only points within the camera's field of view. These two components enable efficient data generation that aligns with real egocentric observations and can be directly transferred across different robot embodiments without any post-processing. Experiments in both simulated and real-world settings demonstrate that UMIGen supports strong cross-embodiment generalization and accelerates data collection in diverse manipulation tasks.

title: Security Index from Input/Output Data: Theory and Computation
summary: The concept of a security index quantifies the minimum number of components that must be compromised to carry out an undetectable attack. This metric enables system operators to quantify each component's security risk and implement countermeasures. In this paper, we introduce a data-driven security index that can be computed solely from input/output data when the system model is unknown. We show a sufficient condition under which the data-driven security index coincides with the model-based security index, which implies that the exact risk level of each component can be identified solely from the data. We provide an algorithm for computing the data-driven security index. Although computing this index is NP-hard, we derive a polynomial-time computable upper bound. Numerical examples on vehicle platooning illustrate the efficacy and limitations of the proposed index and algorithms.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种数据驱动的安全指数，用于在系统模型未知的情况下，仅通过输入/输出数据量化组件的安全风险，并提供了一种计算方法及其多项式时间可计算的上界。
AI.motivation: 现有的安全指数概念需要系统模型才能量化组件的安全风险并实施对策。然而，在许多实际场景中，系统模型是未知的，因此需要一种无需模型即可计算安全风险的方法。
AI.method: 本文引入了一个数据驱动的安全指数，该指数仅通过输入/输出数据即可计算。研究了数据驱动安全指数与基于模型的安全指数一致的充分条件。提出了一种计算数据驱动安全指数的算法（NP-hard），并推导出了一个多项式时间可计算的上界。
AI.result: 提出了一种可在系统模型未知时通过输入/输出数据计算的数据驱动安全指数。证明了在特定充分条件下，该指数与基于模型的安全指数一致。提供了一个计算该指数的算法，并推导了一个多项式时间可计算的上界。通过车辆编队示例验证了所提指数和算法的有效性和局限性。
AI.conclusion: 数据驱动的安全指数能够有效量化未知模型系统中各组件的安全风险。虽然精确计算是NP-hard问题，但多项式时间上界的推导使其具有实际应用价值，尽管在某些情况下可能存在局限性。

title: AuthSig: Safeguarding Scanned Signatures Against Unauthorized Reuse in Paperless Workflows
summary: With the deepening trend of paperless workflows, signatures as a means of identity authentication are gradually shifting from traditional ink-on-paper to electronic formats.Despite the availability of dynamic pressure-sensitive and PKI-based digital signatures, static scanned signatures remain prevalent in practice due to their convenience. However, these static images, having almost lost their authentication attributes, cannot be reliably verified and are vulnerable to malicious copying and reuse. To address these issues, we propose AuthSig, a novel static electronic signature framework based on generative models and watermark, which binds authentication information to the signature image. Leveraging the human visual system's insensitivity to subtle style variations, AuthSig finely modulates style embeddings during generation to implicitly encode watermark bits-enforcing a One Signature, One Use policy.To overcome the scarcity of handwritten signature data and the limitations of traditional augmentation methods, we introduce a keypoint-driven data augmentation strategy that effectively enhances style diversity to support robust watermark embedding. Experimental results show that AuthSig achieves over 98% extraction accuracy under both digital-domain distortions and signature-specific degradations, and remains effective even in print-scan scenarios.

AI.tldr: AuthSig是一个基于生成模型和水印的新型静态电子签名框架，通过微调签名风格隐式编码水印信息，实现签名与认证信息绑定及“一次一用”策略，并引入关键点驱动的数据增强方法，有效解决了静态签名易被复制和无法验证的问题。
AI.motivation: 尽管有动态压感和PKI数字签名，但静态扫描签名因其便利性仍广泛存在。然而，这些静态图像几乎失去了认证属性，无法可靠验证，且易被恶意复制和重用，导致其安全性低下。
AI.method: 本文提出了AuthSig框架，利用生成模型和水印技术，将认证信息绑定到签名图像中。它利用人类视觉系统对细微风格变化的感知不敏感性，在签名生成过程中精细调制风格嵌入，隐式编码水印比特，以强制执行“一次一用”策略。为解决手写签名数据稀缺和传统数据增强方法的局限性，引入了一种关键点驱动的数据增强策略，有效提升风格多样性，以支持鲁棒的水印嵌入。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，AuthSig在数字域失真和特定于签名的降级下，均能实现超过98%的水印提取准确率。即使在打印-扫描场景中，该框架也保持了有效性。
AI.conclusion: AuthSig为静态电子签名提供了一种新颖、鲁棒的认证解决方案，通过将认证信息绑定到签名图像并强制执行“一次一用”策略，有效解决了静态签名缺乏可靠验证且易受复制重用攻击的问题。

title: Causally-Grounded Dual-Path Attention Intervention for Object Hallucination Mitigation in LVLMs
summary: Object hallucination remains a critical challenge in Large Vision-Language Models (LVLMs), where models generate content inconsistent with visual inputs. Existing language-decoder based mitigation approaches often regulate visual or textual attention independently, overlooking their interaction as two key causal factors. To address this, we propose Owl (Bi-mOdal attention reWeighting for Layer-wise hallucination mitigation), a causally-grounded framework that models hallucination process via a structural causal graph, treating decomposed visual and textual attentions as mediators. We introduce VTACR (Visual-to-Textual Attention Contribution Ratio), a novel metric that quantifies the modality contribution imbalance during decoding. Our analysis reveals that hallucinations frequently occur in low-VTACR scenarios, where textual priors dominate and visual grounding is weakened. To mitigate this, we design a fine-grained attention intervention mechanism that dynamically adjusts token- and layer-wise attention guided by VTACR signals. Finally, we propose a dual-path contrastive decoding strategy: one path emphasizes visually grounded predictions, while the other amplifies hallucinated ones -- letting visual truth shine and hallucination collapse. Experimental results on the POPE and CHAIR benchmarks show that Owl achieves significant hallucination reduction, setting a new SOTA in faithfulness while preserving vision-language understanding capability. Our code is available at https://github.com/CikZ2023/OWL

AI.tldr: 本文提出Owl框架，通过对视觉和文本注意力进行双模态重加权，并利用因果图和VTACR指标，有效缓解大型视觉-语言模型中的物体幻觉问题，实现SOTA性能。
AI.motivation: 大型视觉-语言模型（LVLMs）中物体幻觉（生成与视觉输入不符的内容）是一个关键挑战。现有基于语言解码器的缓解方法通常独立调节视觉或文本注意力，忽略了它们之间的交互作用，未能从根本上解决问题。
AI.method: 本文提出Owl框架，通过结构化因果图将幻觉过程建模为视觉和文本注意力的中介作用。引入VTACR（视觉到文本注意力贡献比）指标量化解码过程中模态贡献失衡，发现低VTACR场景易发生幻觉。设计了细粒度注意力干预机制，根据VTACR信号动态调整token和层级的注意力。最后，提出双路径对比解码策略，一条路径强调视觉接地预测，另一条放大幻觉预测，以增强视觉真实性并抑制幻觉。
AI.result: 在POPE和CHAIR基准测试上的实验结果表明，Owl显著减少了幻觉，在忠实度方面达到了新的SOTA，同时保留了视觉-语言理解能力。
AI.conclusion: Owl框架通过对视觉和文本注意力的因果建模和干预，有效解决了LVLMs中的物体幻觉问题，显著提高了模型的忠实度，为幻觉缓解提供了新的有效途径。

title: LoopTool: Closing the Data-Training Loop for Robust LLM Tool Calls
summary: Augmenting Large Language Models (LLMs) with external tools enables them to execute complex, multi-step tasks. However, tool learning is hampered by the static synthetic data pipelines where data generation and model training are executed as two separate, non-interactive processes. This approach fails to adaptively focus on a model's specific weaknesses and allows noisy labels to persist, degrading training efficiency. We introduce LoopTool, a fully automated, model-aware data evolution framework that closes this loop by tightly integrating data synthesis and model training. LoopTool iteratively refines both the data and the model through three synergistic modules: (1) Greedy Capability Probing (GCP) diagnoses the model's mastered and failed capabilities; (2) Judgement-Guided Label Verification (JGLV) uses an open-source judge model to find and correct annotation errors, progressively purifying the dataset; and (3) Error-Driven Data Expansion (EDDE) generates new, challenging samples based on identified failures. This closed-loop process operates within a cost-effective, open-source ecosystem, eliminating dependence on expensive closed-source APIs. Experiments show that our 8B model trained with LoopTool significantly surpasses its 32B data generator and achieves new state-of-the-art results on the BFCL-v3 and ACEBench benchmarks for its scale. Our work demonstrates that closed-loop, self-refining data pipelines can dramatically enhance the tool-use capabilities of LLMs.

AI.tldr: LoopTool是一个全自动、模型感知的数据演化框架，通过紧密结合数据合成和模型训练，迭代地提升大型语言模型（LLM）的工具使用能力，解决了传统静态数据管道的低效问题。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM工具学习受限于静态合成数据管道，数据生成与模型训练分离且非交互，无法适应性地针对模型弱点，并导致噪声标签持续存在，降低了训练效率。
AI.method: LoopTool通过闭环过程迭代优化数据和模型。它包含三个协同模块：1) 贪婪能力探测（GCP）诊断模型的掌握和失败能力；2) 判断引导标签验证（JGLV）使用开源判别模型纠正标注错误，净化数据集；3) 错误驱动数据扩展（EDDE）根据识别出的失败生成新的挑战性样本。整个过程在经济高效的开源生态系统中运行。
AI.result: 通过LoopTool训练的8B模型显著超越了其32B数据生成器，并在BFCL-v3和ACEBench基准测试中达到了同等规模下的新SOTA结果。
AI.conclusion: 该研究表明，闭环、自精炼的数据管道能够显著增强LLM的工具使用能力。

title: One-Topic-Doesn't-Fit-All: Transcreating Reading Comprehension Test for Personalized Learning
summary: Personalized learning has gained attention in English as a Foreign Language (EFL) education, where engagement and motivation play crucial roles in reading comprehension. We propose a novel approach to generating personalized English reading comprehension tests tailored to students' interests. We develop a structured content transcreation pipeline using OpenAI's gpt-4o, where we start with the RACE-C dataset, and generate new passages and multiple-choice reading comprehension questions that are linguistically similar to the original passages but semantically aligned with individual learners' interests. Our methodology integrates topic extraction, question classification based on Bloom's taxonomy, linguistic feature analysis, and content transcreation to enhance student engagement. We conduct a controlled experiment with EFL learners in South Korea to examine the impact of interest-aligned reading materials on comprehension and motivation. Our results show students learning with personalized reading passages demonstrate improved comprehension and motivation retention compared to those learning with non-personalized materials.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种利用GPT-4o为EFL学生生成个性化英语阅读理解测试的新方法，这些测试与学生的兴趣相符，并在一项受控实验中显示出对理解和学习动机的积极影响。
AI.motivation: 个性化学习在EFL教育中受到关注，其中参与度和动机对阅读理解至关重要。研究旨在解决现有材料可能无法充分激发学生兴趣的问题，从而提升阅读理解和学习动机。
AI.method: 开发了一个结构化的内容转换流程，使用OpenAI的GPT-4o。该流程从RACE-C数据集开始，生成新的阅读文章和多项选择题。新内容在语言上与原文相似，但在语义上与学习者的兴趣对齐。方法整合了主题提取、基于布鲁姆分类法的题目分类、语言特征分析和内容转换。通过在韩国EFL学习者中进行的对照实验，评估了兴趣导向阅读材料的影响。
AI.result: 与使用非个性化材料学习的学生相比，使用个性化阅读文章学习的学生表现出更高的理解能力和更强的动机保持力。
AI.conclusion: 为EFL学习者提供与兴趣相符的个性化阅读材料，能够显著提高他们的阅读理解能力和学习动机。

title: Efficient and Effective In-context Demonstration Selection with Coreset
comment: This paper is accepted by AAAI26
summary: In-context learning (ICL) has emerged as a powerful paradigm for Large Visual Language Models (LVLMs), enabling them to leverage a few examples directly from input contexts. However, the effectiveness of this approach is heavily reliant on the selection of demonstrations, a process that is NP-hard. Traditional strategies, including random, similarity-based sampling and infoscore-based sampling, often lead to inefficiencies or suboptimal performance, struggling to balance both efficiency and effectiveness in demonstration selection. In this paper, we propose a novel demonstration selection framework named Coreset-based Dual Retrieval (CoDR). We show that samples within a diverse subset achieve a higher expected mutual information. To implement this, we introduce a cluster-pruning method to construct a diverse coreset that aligns more effectively with the query while maintaining diversity. Additionally, we develop a dual retrieval mechanism that enhances the selection process by achieving global demonstration selection while preserving efficiency. Experimental results demonstrate that our method significantly improves the ICL performance compared to the existing strategies, providing a robust solution for effective and efficient demonstration selection.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为CoDR的新型演示选择框架，通过构建多样化的核心集和双重检索机制，显著提升了大型视觉语言模型(LVLMs)的上下文学习(ICL)性能，解决了传统方法在效率和效果上的不足。
AI.motivation: 上下文学习(ICL)对大型视觉语言模型(LVLMs)至关重要，但其效果严重依赖于演示样本的选择，这是一个NP难问题。传统策略（如随机、基于相似性或信息分数采样）在效率和有效性之间难以平衡，导致性能不佳或效率低下。
AI.method: 本文提出了一个名为Coreset-based Dual Retrieval (CoDR)的演示选择框架。该方法首先通过引入聚类剪枝方法来构建一个多样化的核心集（coreset），旨在确保样本多样性并与查询更有效对齐，作者论证了多样化子集中的样本具有更高的预期互信息。其次，开发了一个双重检索机制，以实现全局演示选择并同时保持高效率。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，与现有策略相比，CoDR方法显著提升了ICL的性能。
AI.conclusion: CoDR为大型视觉语言模型中的有效和高效演示选择提供了一个鲁棒的解决方案。

title: T-Rex-Omni: Integrating Negative Visual Prompt in Generic Object Detection
comment: Accepted by AAAI 2026. Main paper: 7 pages with 4 figures; Appendix: 8 pages with 7 figures
summary: Object detection methods have evolved from closed-set to open-set paradigms over the years. Current open-set object detectors, however, remain constrained by their exclusive reliance on positive indicators based on given prompts like text descriptions or visual exemplars. This positive-only paradigm experiences consistent vulnerability to visually similar but semantically different distractors. We propose T-Rex-Omni, a novel framework that addresses this limitation by incorporating negative visual prompts to negate hard negative distractors. Specifically, we first introduce a unified visual prompt encoder that jointly processes positive and negative visual prompts. Next, a training-free Negating Negative Computing (NNC) module is proposed to dynamically suppress negative responses during the probability computing stage. To further boost performance through fine-tuning, our Negating Negative Hinge (NNH) loss enforces discriminative margins between positive and negative embeddings. T-Rex-Omni supports flexible deployment in both positive-only and joint positive-negative inference modes, accommodating either user-specified or automatically generated negative examples. Extensive experiments demonstrate remarkable zero-shot detection performance, significantly narrowing the performance gap between visual-prompted and text-prompted methods while showing particular strength in long-tailed scenarios (51.2 AP_r on LVIS-minival). This work establishes negative prompts as a crucial new dimension for advancing open-set visual recognition systems.

AI.tldr: T-Rex-Omni 是一种新型开放集目标检测框架，通过引入负向视觉提示来消除视觉相似但语义不同的干扰物，显著提升了零样本检测性能。
AI.motivation: 当前开放集目标检测方法过度依赖基于文本或视觉示例的“仅正向”提示，这使其容易受到视觉上相似但语义上不同的干扰物的影响。
AI.method: 本文提出了 T-Rex-Omni 框架。它首先引入了一个统一的视觉提示编码器，能同时处理正向和负向视觉提示。其次，设计了一个无需训练的“否定负向计算 (NNC)”模块，在概率计算阶段动态抑制负向响应。为进一步提升性能，提出了“否定负向合页 (NNH)”损失，用于在正负嵌入之间强制执行判别性裕度。T-Rex-Omni 支持正向-仅或正向-负向联合推理模式，可使用用户指定或自动生成的负例。
AI.result: 广泛的实验证明了卓越的零样本检测性能，显著缩小了视觉提示方法与文本提示方法之间的性能差距，并在长尾场景中表现出特别的优势（LVIS-minival 上达到 51.2 AP_r）。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作确立了负向提示作为推动开放集视觉识别系统发展的一个关键新维度。

title: A Hybrid Search for Complex Table Question Answering in Securities Report
summary: Recently, Large Language Models (LLMs) are gaining increased attention in the domain of Table Question Answering (TQA), particularly for extracting information from tables in documents. However, directly entering entire tables as long text into LLMs often leads to incorrect answers because most LLMs cannot inherently capture complex table structures. In this paper, we propose a cell extraction method for TQA without manual identification, even for complex table headers. Our approach estimates table headers by computing similarities between a given question and individual cells via a hybrid retrieval mechanism that integrates a language model and TF-IDF. We then select as the answer the cells at the intersection of the most relevant row and column. Furthermore, the language model is trained using contrastive learning on a small dataset of question-header pairs to enhance performance. We evaluated our approach in the TQA dataset from the U4 shared task at NTCIR-18. The experimental results show that our pipeline achieves an accuracy of 74.6\%, outperforming existing LLMs such as GPT-4o mini~(63.9\%). In the future, although we used traditional encoder models for retrieval in this study, we plan to incorporate more efficient text-search models to improve performance and narrow the gap with human evaluation results.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种无需手动识别表头的单元格提取方法，用于表格问答（TQA），通过混合检索机制（语言模型+TF-IDF）计算问题与单元格的相似度来估计表头，并在相关行和列的交点处选择答案。该方法在NTCIR-18 U4 TQA数据集上取得了74.6%的准确率，优于现有LLM。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型（LLM）在表格问答（TQA）中面临挑战，直接将整个表格作为长文本输入LLM往往会导致不准确的答案，因为大多数LLM无法固有地捕捉复杂的表格结构。
AI.method: 本文提出了一种无需手动识别表头（即使对于复杂表头）的单元格提取方法。该方法通过结合语言模型和TF-IDF的混合检索机制，计算给定问题与单个单元格之间的相似度来估计表头。然后，选择最相关行和列交点处的单元格作为答案。此外，语言模型通过对比学习在一个小规模的问题-表头对数据集上进行训练以增强性能。
AI.result: 在NTCIR-18 U4共享任务的TQA数据集上进行评估，该方法实现了74.6%的准确率，优于现有LLM（如GPT-4o mini的63.9%）。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的单元格提取方法能有效解决LLM在TQA中处理复杂表格结构的问题，并取得了优于现有LLM的性能。未来计划整合更高效的文本搜索模型以进一步提升性能并缩小与人类评估结果的差距。

title: PAN: A World Model for General, Interactable, and Long-Horizon World Simulation
summary: A world model enables an intelligent agent to imagine, predict, and reason about how the world evolves in response to its actions, and accordingly to plan and strategize. While recent video generation models produce realistic visual sequences, they typically operate in the prompt-to-full-video manner without causal control, interactivity, or long-horizon consistency required for purposeful reasoning. Existing world modeling efforts, on the other hand, often focus on restricted domains (e.g., physical, game, or 3D-scene dynamics) with limited depth and controllability, and struggle to generalize across diverse environments and interaction formats. In this work, we introduce PAN, a general, interactable, and long-horizon world model that predicts future world states through high-quality video simulation conditioned on history and natural language actions. PAN employs the Generative Latent Prediction (GLP) architecture that combines an autoregressive latent dynamics backbone based on a large language model (LLM), which grounds simulation in extensive text-based knowledge and enables conditioning on language-specified actions, with a video diffusion decoder that reconstructs perceptually detailed and temporally coherent visual observations, to achieve a unification between latent space reasoning (imagination) and realizable world dynamics (reality). Trained on large-scale video-action pairs spanning diverse domains, PAN supports open-domain, action-conditioned simulation with coherent, long-term dynamics. Extensive experiments show that PAN achieves strong performance in action-conditioned world simulation, long-horizon forecasting, and simulative reasoning compared to other video generators and world models, taking a step towards general world models that enable predictive simulation of future world states for reasoning and acting.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了一个名为PAN的通用、可交互、长视距世界模型，它通过高质量视频模拟，根据历史和自然语言动作预测未来世界状态，并采用结合大型语言模型和视频扩散解码器的GLP架构。
AI.motivation: 现有视频生成模型缺乏因果控制、交互性或长期一致性，不适用于有目的的推理。现有世界模型则局限于特定领域，深度和可控性有限，难以泛化。因此，需要一个通用、可交互、长视距的世界模型。
AI.method: PAN模型采用生成式潜在预测（GLP）架构。GLP结合了一个基于大型语言模型（LLM）的自回归潜在动力学骨干，该骨干利用文本知识并支持语言指定的动作，以及一个视频扩散解码器，用于重建感知细节丰富且时间连贯的视觉观测。该模型通过在涵盖不同领域的大规模视频-动作对上进行训练。
AI.result: PAN支持开放域、动作条件下的模拟，具有连贯的长期动态。与现有视频生成器和世界模型相比，PAN在动作条件世界模拟、长视距预测和模拟推理方面表现出色。
AI.conclusion: PAN模型向构建通用世界模型迈出了一步，该模型能够预测未来世界状态以进行推理和行动，从而实现潜在空间推理与可实现世界动态的统一。

title: C$^3$TG: Conflict-aware, Composite, and Collaborative Controlled Text Generation
comment: This paper has been accepted as a poster presentation at AAAI-2026
summary: Recent advancements in large language models (LLMs) have demonstrated remarkable text generation capabilities. However, controlling specific attributes of generated text remains challenging without architectural modifications or extensive fine-tuning. Current methods typically toggle a single, basic attribute but struggle with precise multi-attribute control. In scenarios where attribute requirements conflict, existing methods lack coordination mechanisms, causing interference between desired attributes. Furthermore, these methods fail to incorporate iterative optimization processes in the controlled generation pipeline. To address these limitations, we propose Conflict-aware, Composite, and Collaborative Controlled Text Generation (C$^3$TG), a two-phase framework for fine-grained, multi-dimensional text attribute control. During generation, C$^3$TG selectively pairs the LLM with the required attribute classifiers from the 17 available dimensions and employs weighted KL-divergence to adjust token probabilities. The optimization phase then leverages an energy function combining classifier scores and penalty terms to resolve attribute conflicts through iterative feedback, enabling precise control over multiple dimensions simultaneously while preserving natural text flow. Experiments show that C$^3$TG significantly outperforms baselines across multiple metrics including attribute accuracy, linguistic fluency, and output diversity, while simultaneously reducing toxicity. These results establish C$^3$TG as an effective and flexible solution for multi-dimensional text attribute control that requires no costly model modifications.

AI.tldr: 本文提出C$^3$TG框架，一个无需修改模型架构或大量微调，用于大型语言模型中精细、多维度文本属性控制的两阶段框架，通过解决属性冲突和迭代优化，显著提升了生成文本的准确性、流畅性和多样性。
AI.motivation: 当前大型语言模型在文本生成方面表现出色，但在不修改架构或大量微调的情况下，难以控制生成文本的特定属性。现有方法通常只能控制单一基本属性，难以实现精确的多属性控制。当属性要求冲突时，现有方法缺乏协调机制，导致属性之间相互干扰。此外，这些方法未能将迭代优化过程融入受控生成流程中。
AI.method: 本文提出了Conflict-aware, Composite, and Collaborative Controlled Text Generation (C$^3$TG)框架，包含两个阶段：1. 生成阶段：C$^3$TG选择性地将LLM与17个可用维度中所需的属性分类器配对，并使用加权KL散度调整token概率。2. 优化阶段：利用结合分类器得分和惩罚项的能量函数，通过迭代反馈解决属性冲突，从而同时实现对多个维度的精确控制，同时保持文本的自然流畅性。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，C$^3$TG在属性准确性、语言流畅性和输出多样性等多项指标上显著优于基线方法，同时还降低了文本的毒性。这些结果证明C$^3$TG是一种有效且灵活的多维度文本属性控制解决方案。
AI.conclusion: C$^3$TG框架是一种有效且灵活的多维度文本属性控制解决方案，无需进行昂贵的模型修改。它通过两阶段处理，解决了多属性控制的挑战、属性冲突以及缺乏迭代优化的问题，显著提升了生成文本的质量和可控性。

title: DensiCrafter: Physically-Constrained Generation and Fabrication of Self-Supporting Hollow Structures
summary: The rise of 3D generative models has enabled automatic 3D geometry and texture synthesis from multimodal inputs (e.g., text or images). However, these methods often ignore physical constraints and manufacturability considerations. In this work, we address the challenge of producing 3D designs that are both lightweight and self-supporting. We present DensiCrafter, a framework for generating lightweight, self-supporting 3D hollow structures by optimizing the density field. Starting from coarse voxel grids produced by Trellis, we interpret these as continuous density fields to optimize and introduce three differentiable, physically constrained, and simulation-free loss terms. Additionally, a mass regularization penalizes unnecessary material, while a restricted optimization domain preserves the outer surface. Our method seamlessly integrates with pretrained Trellis-based models (e.g., Trellis, DSO) without any architectural changes. In extensive evaluations, we achieve up to 43% reduction in material mass on the text-to-3D task. Compared to state-of-the-art baselines, our method could improve the stability and maintain high geometric fidelity. Real-world 3D-printing experiments confirm that our hollow designs can be reliably fabricated and could be self-supporting.

AI.tldr: DensiCrafter是一个生成轻量级、自支撑3D空心结构的新框架，通过优化密度场并引入物理约束损失，显著减少材料质量，同时保持几何保真度和可制造性。
AI.motivation: 现有的3D生成模型通常忽略物理约束和可制造性，导致生成的3D设计可能不轻量化或不具备自支撑能力。
AI.method: 该方法名为DensiCrafter，从Trellis生成的粗糙体素网格开始，将其解释为连续密度场进行优化。它引入了三个可微分、物理约束且无仿真的损失项，并结合质量正则化以惩罚不必要的材料，以及受限优化域以保持外表面。该方法可无缝集成到基于Trellis的预训练模型中。
AI.result: 在文本到3D任务中，材料质量减少高达43%。与现有基线相比，该方法提高了稳定性并保持了高几何保真度。实际3D打印实验证实了空心设计的可靠制造和自支撑能力。
AI.conclusion: DensiCrafter成功解决了生成轻量级、自支撑3D设计的挑战，通过优化密度场和引入物理约束，实现了材料效率高、稳定且可制造的3D结构，填补了现有3D生成模型在物理可行性方面的空白。

title: The Learning Dynamics of Subword Segmentation for Morphologically Diverse Languages
summary: Subword segmentation is typically applied in preprocessing and stays fixed during training. Alternatively, it can be learned during training to optimise the training objective. In this paper we study the learning dynamics of subword segmentation: if a language model can dynamically optimise tokenisation, how do its subwords evolve during pretraining and finetuning? To explore this, we extend the subword segmental language model (SSLM), a framework for learning subwords during training, to support pretraining and finetuning. We train models for three typologically diverse languages to study learning dynamics across the morphological spectrum: Isi-Xhosa is conjunctive (long word forms composed of many morphemes), Setswana is disjunctive (morphemes written as separate words), and English represents a typological middle ground. We analyse subword dynamics from a linguistic perspective, tracking morphology, productivity, and fertility. We identify four stages of subword learning, with the morphologically complex isi-Xhosa exhibiting greater instability. During finetuning, subword boundaries shift to become finer-grained. Lastly, we show that learnable subwords offers a promising approach to improve text generation and cross-lingual transfer for low-resource, morphologically complex languages.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了预训练和微调过程中子词分割的动态学习过程，分析了其在不同形态语言中的演变，并展示了其对低资源、形态复杂语言的益处。
AI.motivation: 传统的子词分割在预处理阶段固定不变，而动态学习子词分割可以优化训练目标。因此，研究人员希望探索语言模型在动态优化分词时，其子词在预训练和微调过程中如何演变。
AI.method: 研究人员扩展了子词切分语言模型（SSLM）框架以支持预训练和微调。他们选择了三种形态类型不同的语言（伊西科萨语、塞茨瓦纳语和英语）进行模型训练，并从语言学角度分析了子词的动态变化，追踪了形态学、生产力和生育能力。
AI.result: 研究确定了子词学习的四个阶段，其中形态复杂的伊西科萨语表现出更大的不稳定性。在微调过程中，子词边界变得更细粒度。此外，可学习的子词为改进文本生成和低资源、形态复杂语言的跨语言迁移提供了一种有前景的方法。
AI.conclusion: 动态学习子词分割是有效的，其演变经历了不同的阶段，并且对形态复杂的低资源语言的文本生成和跨语言迁移具有显著优势。

title: Dense Cross-Scale Image Alignment With Fully Spatial Correlation and Just Noticeable Difference Guidance
summary: Existing unsupervised image alignment methods exhibit limited accuracy and high computational complexity. To address these challenges, we propose a dense cross-scale image alignment model. It takes into account the correlations between cross-scale features to decrease the alignment difficulty. Our model supports flexible trade-offs between accuracy and efficiency by adjusting the number of scales utilized. Additionally, we introduce a fully spatial correlation module to further improve accuracy while maintaining low computational costs. We incorporate the just noticeable difference to encourage our model to focus on image regions more sensitive to distortions, eliminating noticeable alignment errors. Extensive quantitative and qualitative experiments demonstrate that our method surpasses state-of-the-art approaches.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种密集跨尺度图像对齐模型，通过考虑跨尺度特征相关性并引入全空间相关模块，提高了无监督图像对齐的准确性和效率，并利用可察觉差异关注敏感区域，超越了现有技术。
AI.motivation: 现有无监督图像对齐方法精度有限且计算复杂度高。
AI.method: 提出一种密集跨尺度图像对齐模型，通过考虑跨尺度特征相关性降低对齐难度。模型支持通过调整尺度数量灵活权衡精度和效率。引入全空间相关模块进一步提高精度并保持低计算成本。整合可察觉差异（JND）以促使模型关注对失真更敏感的图像区域，消除明显的对齐误差。
AI.result: 大量的定量和定性实验表明，该方法超越了现有最先进的方法。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的密集跨尺度图像对齐模型通过创新性的特征相关性处理、效率与精度权衡以及对失真敏感区域的关注，有效解决了无监督图像对齐的挑战，实现了卓越的性能。

title: WDT-MD: Wavelet Diffusion Transformers for Microaneurysm Detection in Fundus Images
comment: 9 pages, 6 figures, 8 tables, accepted by AAAI 2026
summary: Microaneurysms (MAs), the earliest pathognomonic signs of Diabetic Retinopathy (DR), present as sub-60 $μm$ lesions in fundus images with highly variable photometric and morphological characteristics, rendering manual screening not only labor-intensive but inherently error-prone. While diffusion-based anomaly detection has emerged as a promising approach for automated MA screening, its clinical application is hindered by three fundamental limitations. First, these models often fall prey to "identity mapping", where they inadvertently replicate the input image. Second, they struggle to distinguish MAs from other anomalies, leading to high false positives. Third, their suboptimal reconstruction of normal features hampers overall performance. To address these challenges, we propose a Wavelet Diffusion Transformer framework for MA Detection (WDT-MD), which features three key innovations: a noise-encoded image conditioning mechanism to avoid "identity mapping" by perturbing image conditions during training; pseudo-normal pattern synthesis via inpainting to introduce pixel-level supervision, enabling discrimination between MAs and other anomalies; and a wavelet diffusion Transformer architecture that combines the global modeling capability of diffusion Transformers with multi-scale wavelet analysis to enhance reconstruction of normal retinal features. Comprehensive experiments on the IDRiD and e-ophtha MA datasets demonstrate that WDT-MD outperforms state-of-the-art methods in both pixel-level and image-level MA detection. This advancement holds significant promise for improving early DR screening.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为WDT-MD的小动脉瘤（MA）检测框架，该框架结合了小波扩散Transformer，通过噪声编码图像条件、伪正常模式合成和多尺度小波分析，解决了现有扩散模型在MA检测中存在的身份映射、区分能力差和正常特征重建不足等问题，并在IDRiD和e-ophtha MA数据集上取得了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 微动脉瘤是糖尿病视网膜病变（DR）的早期标志，手动筛查费时且易出错。现有的基于扩散的异常检测方法在临床应用中存在三个主要限制：容易发生“身份映射”，难以区分微动脉瘤与其他异常导致高假阳性，以及对正常特征的重建效果不佳。
AI.method: 本文提出了Wavelet Diffusion Transformer for MA Detection (WDT-MD) 框架，包含三项创新：1) 噪声编码图像条件机制，通过在训练过程中扰动图像条件来避免“身份映射”；2) 通过修复合成伪正常模式，引入像素级监督以区分微动脉瘤和其他异常；3) 结合扩散Transformer的全局建模能力和多尺度小波分析的小波扩散Transformer架构，以增强正常视网膜特征的重建。
AI.result: 在IDRiD和e-ophtha MA数据集上进行的综合实验表明，WDT-MD在像素级和图像级微动脉瘤检测方面均优于现有最先进的方法。
AI.conclusion: WDT-MD的进步为改善早期糖尿病视网膜病变筛查提供了重要的前景。

title: Thinking Forward and Backward: Multi-Objective Reinforcement Learning for Retrieval-Augmented Reasoning
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) has proven to be effective in mitigating hallucinations in large language models, yet its effectiveness remains limited in complex, multi-step reasoning scenarios.Recent efforts have incorporated search-based interactions into RAG, enabling iterative reasoning with real-time retrieval. Most approaches rely on outcome-based supervision, offering no explicit guidance for intermediate steps. This often leads to reward hacking and degraded response quality. We propose Bi-RAR, a novel retrieval-augmented reasoning framework that evaluates each intermediate step jointly in both forward and backward directions. To assess the information completeness of each step, we introduce a bidirectional information distance grounded in Kolmogorov complexity, approximated via language model generation probabilities. This quantification measures both how far the current reasoning is from the answer and how well it addresses the question. To optimize reasoning under these bidirectional signals, we adopt a multi-objective reinforcement learning framework with a cascading reward structure that emphasizes early trajectory alignment. Empirical results on seven question answering benchmarks demonstrate that Bi-RAR surpasses previous methods and enables efficient interaction and reasoning with the search engine during training and inference.

AI.tldr: Bi-RAR提出了一种新的检索增强推理框架，通过引入基于Kolmogorov复杂度的双向信息距离来评估并优化RAG在复杂多步推理场景中的中间步骤，并在多目标强化学习下实现了卓越的性能。
AI.motivation: RAG在复杂多步推理场景中缓解幻觉的效果有限。现有结合搜索的RAG方法依赖结果监督，缺乏对中间步骤的显式指导，容易导致奖励欺骗和响应质量下降。
AI.method: Bi-RAR框架对每个中间步骤进行前向和后向双向评估。引入基于Kolmogorov复杂度的双向信息距离（通过语言模型生成概率近似），量化推理与答案的距离以及对问题的解决程度。采用多目标强化学习框架，具有强调早期轨迹对齐的级联奖励结构，以优化双向信号下的推理。
AI.result: 在七个问答基准测试中，Bi-RAR超越了以往的方法，并在训练和推理过程中实现了与搜索引擎的高效交互和推理。
AI.conclusion: Bi-RAR通过双向评估和多目标强化学习，有效提升了RAG在复杂多步推理场景中的性能，解决了现有方法中间步骤指导不足的问题，并实现了与搜索引擎的高效交互。

title: Context is Enough: Empirical Validation of $\textit{Sequentiality}$ on Essays
summary: Recent work has proposed using Large Language Models (LLMs) to quantify narrative flow through a measure called sequentiality, which combines topic and contextual terms. A recent critique argued that the original results were confounded by how topics were selected for the topic-based component, and noted that the metric had not been validated against ground-truth measures of flow. That work proposed using only the contextual term as a more conceptually valid and interpretable alternative. In this paper, we empirically validate that proposal. Using two essay datasets with human-annotated trait scores, ASAP++ and ELLIPSE, we show that the contextual version of sequentiality aligns more closely with human assessments of discourse-level traits such as Organization and Cohesion. While zero-shot prompted LLMs predict trait scores more accurately than the contextual measure alone, the contextual measure adds more predictive value than both the topic-only and original sequentiality formulations when combined with standard linguistic features. Notably, this combination also outperforms the zero-shot LLM predictions, highlighting the value of explicitly modeling sentence-to-sentence flow. Our findings support the use of context-based sequentiality as a validated, interpretable, and complementary feature for automated essay scoring and related NLP tasks.

AI.tldr: 本文实证验证了基于上下文的序列性度量在量化叙事流畅性方面的有效性，发现它与人类评估更一致，并能提高自动作文评分的预测能力。
AI.motivation: 之前的研究提出了基于大型语言模型（LLMs）的序列性来量化叙事流畅性，但有批评指出其主题选择存在混淆，且缺乏地面真实性验证。该批评建议仅使用上下文术语作为更有效和可解释的替代方案，本文旨在实证验证这一提议。
AI.method: 研究使用了两个带有 H类人工标注特质分数的论文数据集（ASAP++ 和 ELLIPSE）。通过比较不同版本的序列性（基于上下文、仅基于主题和原始版本），以及零样本提示的LLMs，通常结合标准语言特征，来评估它们的预测能力和与人类评估的一致性。
AI.result: 基于上下文的序列性与人类对语篇层面特质（如组织和连贯性）的评估更紧密对齐。尽管零样本LLMs单独预测特质分数更准确，但当与标准语言特征结合时，基于上下文的度量比仅基于主题或原始序列性公式增加了更多的预测价值。值得注意的是，这种结合甚至优于零样本LLM的预测，突出了明确建模句子间流畅性的价值。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果支持将基于上下文的序列性作为一种经过验证、可解释且互补的特征，用于自动作文评分及相关自然语言处理任务。

title: Self-Correcting Large Language Models: Generation vs. Multiple Choice
summary:
Large language models have recently demonstrated remarkable abilities to self-correct their responses through iterative refinement, often referred to as self-consistency or self-reflection. However, the dynamics of this self-correction mechanism may differ substantially depending on whether the model is tasked with open-ended text generation or with selecting the most appropriate response from multiple predefined options. In this paper, we conduct a systematic investigation of these two paradigms by comparing performance trends and error-correction behaviors across various natural language understanding and reasoning tasks, covering language models of different scales and families. Our experimental results reveal distinct patterns of improvement and failure modes:
  \textit{While open-ended generation often benefits from the flexibility of re-interpretation and compositional refinement, multiple-choice selection can leverage clearer solution boundaries but may be limited by the provided options}. This contrast also reflects the dual demands faced by emerging agentic LLM applications: effective agents must not only generate and refine open-ended plans or explanations, but also make reliable discrete choices when operating within constrained action spaces. Our findings, therefore, highlight that the design of self-correction mechanisms should take into account the interaction between task structure and output space, with implications for both knowledge-intensive reasoning and decision-oriented applications of LLMs.

AI.tldr: 本文系统比较了大型语言模型在开放式生成和多项选择任务中自我纠正机制的动态，发现其改进模式和失败模式存在显著差异，并强调了任务结构与输出空间对自我纠正设计的重要性。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型通过迭代细化展现出强大的自我纠正能力，但这种机制在开放式文本生成和从预定义选项中选择最佳响应这两种任务范式下的动态可能存在显著差异，因此需要进行系统研究。
AI.method: 通过比较不同规模和家族的语言模型在各种自然语言理解和推理任务中的性能趋势和纠错行为，对开放式生成和多项选择这两种范式进行了系统调查。
AI.result: 实验结果揭示了独特的改进模式和失败模式：开放式生成受益于重新解释和组合细化的灵活性，而多项选择则能利用更清晰的解决方案边界，但可能受限于提供的选项。这反映了新兴代理式LLM应用面临的双重需求。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果强调，自我纠正机制的设计应考虑任务结构和输出空间之间的相互作用，这对知识密集型推理和面向决策的LLM应用都具有重要意义。

title: VietMEAgent: Culturally-Aware Few-Shot Multimodal Explanation for Vietnamese Visual Question Answering
summary: Contemporary Visual Question Answering (VQA) systems remain constrained when confronted with culturally specific content, largely because cultural knowledge is under-represented in training corpora and the reasoning process is not rendered interpretable to end users. This paper introduces VietMEAgent, a multimodal explainable framework engineered for Vietnamese cultural understanding. The method integrates a cultural object detection backbone with a structured program generation layer, yielding a pipeline in which answer prediction and explanation are tightly coupled. A curated knowledge base of Vietnamese cultural entities serves as an explicit source of background information, while a dual-modality explanation module combines attention-based visual evidence with structured, human-readable textual rationales. We further construct a Vietnamese Cultural VQA dataset sourced from public repositories and use it to demonstrate the practicality of programming-based methodologies for cultural AI. The resulting system provides transparent explanations that disclose both the computational rationale and the underlying cultural context, supporting education and cultural preservation with an emphasis on interpretability and cultural sensitivity.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了VietMEAgent，一个针对越南文化理解的多模态可解释视觉问答（VQA）框架，它通过集成文化物体检测、结构化程序生成和双模态解释模块，实现了答案预测和透明解释，并构建了相关数据集。
AI.motivation: 现有VQA系统在处理文化特定内容时表现受限，原因在于训练语料中文化知识不足且推理过程不可解释。研究旨在解决这一问题，提升系统对文化内容的理解和解释能力。
AI.method: 引入了VietMEAgent框架，它结合了文化物体检测骨干网络和结构化程序生成层，紧密耦合答案预测和解释。该方法利用精心策划的越南文化实体知识库作为背景信息源，并采用双模态解释模块，融合基于注意力的视觉证据和结构化、人类可读的文本解释。此外，还构建了一个越南文化VQA数据集。
AI.result: 该系统成功展示了基于编程的方法在文化AI中的实用性，并提供了透明的解释，揭示了计算推理过程和潜在的文化背景。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的系统通过强调可解释性和文化敏感性，支持文化教育和文化遗产保护。

title: Stabilizing Reinforcement Learning for Honesty Alignment in Language Models on Deductive Reasoning
summary: Reinforcement learning with verifiable rewards (RLVR) has recently emerged as a promising framework for aligning language models with complex reasoning objectives. However, most existing methods optimize only for final task outcomes, leaving models vulnerable to collapse when negative rewards dominate early training. This challenge is especially pronounced in honesty alignment, where models must not only solve answerable queries but also identify when conclusions cannot be drawn from the given premises. Deductive reasoning provides an ideal testbed because it isolates reasoning capability from reliance on external factual knowledge. To investigate honesty alignment, we curate two multi-step deductive reasoning datasets from graph structures, one for linear algebra and one for logical inference, and introduce unanswerable cases by randomly perturbing an edge in half of the instances. We find that GRPO, with or without supervised fine tuning initialization, struggles on these tasks. Through extensive experiments across three models, we evaluate stabilization strategies and show that curriculum learning provides some benefit but requires carefully designed in distribution datasets with controllable difficulty. To address these limitations, we propose Anchor, a reinforcement learning method that injects ground truth trajectories into rollouts, preventing early training collapse. Our results demonstrate that this method stabilizes learning and significantly improves the overall reasoning performance, underscoring the importance of training dynamics for enabling reliable deductive reasoning in aligned language models.

AI.tldr: 在可验证奖励强化学习（RLVR）中，语言模型在诚实对齐和演绎推理任务中容易出现早期训练崩溃。本文提出Anchor方法，通过注入真实轨迹来稳定训练，显著提升了模型性能。
AI.motivation: 现有RLVR方法仅优化最终任务结果，导致在早期训练中负奖励占主导时模型容易崩溃。尤其是在诚实对齐（模型需识别不可回答问题）方面，这一挑战更为突出。演绎推理是一个理想的测试平台，因为它能隔离推理能力与外部事实知识的依赖。
AI.method: 本文构建了两个基于图结构的多步演绎推理数据集（线性代数和逻辑推理），并通过随机扰动一半实例中的边来引入不可回答的情况。研究评估了GRPO（无论有无监督微调初始化）、课程学习，并提出了一种名为Anchor的强化学习方法，该方法将真实轨迹注入到rollout中，以防止早期训练崩溃。
AI.result: 实验发现GRPO在这些任务上表现不佳。课程学习虽有益处，但需要精心设计具有可控难度的分布内数据集。Anchor方法能够稳定学习过程，并显著提高整体推理性能。
AI.conclusion: 训练动态对于实现对齐语言模型中可靠的演绎推理至关重要。Anchor方法通过注入真实轨迹，有效解决了早期训练崩溃问题，提升了模型性能。

title: USF-Net: A Unified Spatiotemporal Fusion Network for Ground-Based Remote Sensing Cloud Image Sequence Extrapolation
summary: Ground-based remote sensing cloud image sequence extrapolation is a key research area in the development of photovoltaic power systems. However, existing approaches exhibit several limitations:(1)they primarily rely on static kernels to augment feature information, lacking adaptive mechanisms to extract features at varying resolutions dynamically;(2)temporal guidance is insufficient, leading to suboptimal modeling of long-range spatiotemporal dependencies; and(3)the quadratic computational cost of attention mechanisms is often overlooked, limiting efficiency in practical deployment. To address these challenges, we propose USF-Net, a Unified Spatiotemporal Fusion Network that integrates adaptive large-kernel convolutions and a low-complexity attention mechanism, combining temporal flow information within an encoder-decoder framework. Specifically, the encoder employs three basic layers to extract features. Followed by the USTM, which comprises:(1)a SiB equipped with a SSM that dynamically captures multi-scale contextual information, and(2)a TiB featuring a TAM that effectively models long-range temporal dependencies while maintaining computational efficiency. In addition, a DSM with a TGM is introduced to enable unified modeling of temporally guided spatiotemporal dependencies. On the decoder side, a DUM is employed to address the common "ghosting effect." It utilizes the initial temporal state as an attention operator to preserve critical motion signatures. As a key contribution, we also introduce and release the ASI-CIS dataset. Extensive experiments on ASI-CIS demonstrate that USF-Net significantly outperforms state-of-the-art methods, establishing a superior balance between prediction accuracy and computational efficiency for ground-based cloud extrapolation. The dataset and source code will be available at https://github.com/she1110/ASI-CIS.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了USF-Net，一个统一时空融合网络，用于地基云图像序列外推。它通过集成自适应大核卷积和低复杂度的注意力机制，结合时间流信息，解决了现有方法在特征提取、时序依赖建模和计算效率方面的局限性，并在新的ASI-CIS数据集上取得了卓越的预测精度和计算效率平衡。
AI.motivation: 现有方法存在以下局限性：(1) 主要依赖静态核增强特征信息，缺乏动态提取多分辨率特征的自适应机制；(2) 时间引导不足，导致长距离时空依赖建模不佳；(3) 忽略了注意力机制的二次计算成本，限制了实际部署的效率。
AI.method: 本文提出了USF-Net，一个统一时空融合网络，采用编码器-解码器框架。编码器使用三层基础层提取特征，后接USF-Net核心模块USMT，该模块包含：(1) 配备SSM的SiB，动态捕获多尺度上下文信息；(2) 配备TAM的TiB，高效建模长距离时间依赖。此外，引入了带有TGM的DSM，实现时间引导的时空依赖统一建模。解码器侧采用DUM，利用初始时间状态作为注意力算子，解决“鬼影效应”并保留关键运动特征。同时，本文还引入并发布了ASI-CIS数据集。
AI.result: 在ASI-CIS数据集上的大量实验表明，USF-Net显著优于现有最先进的方法，在地基云外推任务中，在预测精度和计算效率之间取得了卓越的平衡。
AI.conclusion: USF-Net通过其创新的自适应大核卷积、低复杂度注意力机制和时间流信息融合，有效解决了地基云图像序列外推的挑战，并在性能和效率上超越了现有方法。新发布的ASI-CIS数据集也为该领域的研究提供了宝贵的资源。

title: Pretraining Finnish ModernBERTs
summary: This paper reports on pretraining ModernBERT encoder models in six different sizes, ranging from 51M to 475M parameters, with a focus on limited multilingualism, emphasizing languages relevant to Finland. Our models are competitive with, or superior to, existing multilingual models. They outperform monolingual models on tasks that require a context longer than 512 tokens. We present empirical results on using different data in the final stage of training. The code and models are publicly released.

AI.tldr: 本文预训练了六种不同大小的ModernBERT编码器模型（51M至475M参数），专注于芬兰相关语言的有限多语言环境，其性能与现有模型相当或更优，并在需要长上下文的任务上超越了单语言模型。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是为芬兰相关语言构建高性能的、有限多语言的BERT模型，以期在特定语言环境中超越现有通用多语言模型和单语言模型。
AI.method: 方法是预训练六种不同参数量（51M至475M）的ModernBERT编码器模型，重点关注与芬兰相关的有限多语言，并在训练的最后阶段使用不同的数据进行实验。
AI.result: 结果显示，所提出的模型与现有通用多语言模型相比具有竞争力或更优的性能。此外，在需要超过512个token上下文的任务上，这些模型表现优于单语言模型。
AI.conclusion: 结论是，通过有限多语言（芬兰相关语言）预训练的ModernBERT模型在性能上具有显著优势，能够与现有领先的多语言模型竞争，并在处理长上下文任务时超越单语言模型，为特定语言环境下的模型开发提供了有效途径。

title: PressTrack-HMR: Pressure-Based Top-Down Multi-Person Global Human Mesh Recovery
summary: Multi-person global human mesh recovery (HMR) is crucial for understanding crowd dynamics and interactions. Traditional vision-based HMR methods sometimes face limitations in real-world scenarios due to mutual occlusions, insufficient lighting, and privacy concerns. Human-floor tactile interactions offer an occlusion-free and privacy-friendly alternative for capturing human motion. Existing research indicates that pressure signals acquired from tactile mats can effectively estimate human pose in single-person scenarios. However, when multiple individuals walk randomly on the mat simultaneously, how to distinguish intermingled pressure signals generated by different persons and subsequently acquire individual temporal pressure data remains a pending challenge for extending pressure-based HMR to the multi-person situation. In this paper, we present \textbf{PressTrack-HMR}, a top-down pipeline that recovers multi-person global human meshes solely from pressure signals. This pipeline leverages a tracking-by-detection strategy to first identify and segment each individual's pressure signal from the raw pressure data, and subsequently performs HMR for each extracted individual signal. Furthermore, we build a multi-person interaction pressure dataset \textbf{MIP}, which facilitates further research into pressure-based human motion analysis in multi-person scenarios. Experimental results demonstrate that our method excels in multi-person HMR using pressure data, with 89.2~$mm$ MPJPE and 112.6~$mm$ WA-MPJPE$_{100}$, and these showcase the potential of tactile mats for ubiquitous, privacy-preserving multi-person action recognition. Our dataset \& code are available at https://github.com/Jiayue-Yuan/PressTrack-HMR.

AI.tldr: 本文提出PressTrack-HMR，一个从压力信号中恢复多人全局人体网格的自顶向下管道，解决了传统视觉方法的局限性以及多人压力信号分离的挑战。
AI.motivation: 传统的基于视觉的人体网格恢复（HMR）方法在实际场景中面临相互遮挡、光照不足和隐私问题。虽然人体-地面触觉交互提供了一种无遮挡、保护隐私的替代方案，但现有研究主要集中在单人场景。当多人在触觉垫上同时随机行走时，如何区分混合的压力信号并获取个体的时间压力数据，是扩展基于压力的HMR到多人场景的未解决挑战。
AI.method: 本文提出了PressTrack-HMR，一个自顶向下的管道，仅从压力信号恢复多人全局人体网格。该管道利用“跟踪-检测”策略，首先从原始压力数据中识别并分割出每个个体的压力信号，然后对每个提取的个体信号执行HMR。此外，本文构建了一个多人交互压力数据集MIP，以促进多人场景下基于压力的运动分析研究。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，该方法在使用压力数据进行多人HMR方面表现出色，实现了89.2毫米的MPJPE和112.6毫米的WA-MPJPE$_{100}$。
AI.conclusion: 该研究展示了触觉垫在普适、隐私保护的多人动作识别方面的巨大潜力，并为多人场景下基于压力的运动分析提供了新的研究方向和数据集。

title: 4KDehazeFlow: Ultra-High-Definition Image Dehazing via Flow Matching
summary: Ultra-High-Definition (UHD) image dehazing faces challenges such as limited scene adaptability in prior-based methods and high computational complexity with color distortion in deep learning approaches. To address these issues, we propose 4KDehazeFlow, a novel method based on Flow Matching and the Haze-Aware vector field. This method models the dehazing process as a progressive optimization of continuous vector field flow, providing efficient data-driven adaptive nonlinear color transformation for high-quality dehazing. Specifically, our method has the following advantages: 1) 4KDehazeFlow is a general method compatible with various deep learning networks, without relying on any specific network architecture. 2) We propose a learnable 3D lookup table (LUT) that encodes haze transformation parameters into a compact 3D mapping matrix, enabling efficient inference through precomputed mappings. 3) We utilize a fourth-order Runge-Kutta (RK4) ordinary differential equation (ODE) solver to stably solve the dehazing flow field through an accurate step-by-step iterative method, effectively suppressing artifacts. Extensive experiments show that 4KDehazeFlow exceeds seven state-of-the-art methods. It delivers a 2dB PSNR increase and better performance in dense haze and color fidelity.

AI.tldr: 本文提出4KDehazeFlow，一种基于流匹配（Flow Matching）和雾霾感知矢量场的新型超高清图像去雾方法，通过连续矢量场流的渐进优化实现高效、高质量的去雾，并有效解决现有方法的局限性。
AI.motivation: 超高清（UHD）图像去雾面临挑战：基于先验的方法场景适应性有限；深度学习方法计算复杂度高且存在色彩失真问题。
AI.method: 本文提出4KDehazeFlow方法，将去雾过程建模为连续矢量场流的渐进优化，实现高效数据驱动的自适应非线性色彩变换。具体优势包括：1) 兼容多种深度学习网络，不依赖特定架构。2) 提出可学习的3D查找表（LUT），将雾霾变换参数编码为紧凑的3D映射矩阵，通过预计算实现高效推理。3) 采用四阶龙格-库塔（RK4）常微分方程（ODE）求解器，通过精确的步进迭代稳定求解去雾流场，有效抑制伪影。
AI.result: 广泛实验表明，4KDehazeFlow超越了七种最先进的方法，实现了2dB的PSNR提升，并在浓雾和色彩保真度方面表现更优。
AI.conclusion: 4KDehazeFlow提供了一种高效、高质量的超高清图像去雾解决方案，有效解决了现有方法在场景适应性、计算复杂度和色彩失真方面的挑战，尤其在浓雾处理和色彩保真度上表现出色。

title: Towards Explainable Khmer Polarity Classification
summary: Khmer polarity classification is a fundamental natural language processing task that assigns a positive, negative, or neutral label to a given Khmer text input. Existing Khmer models typically predict the label without explaining the rationale behind the prediction. This paper proposes an explainable Khmer polarity classifier by fine-tuning an instruction-based reasoning Qwen-3 model. The notion of explainability in this paper is limited to self-explanations, which the model uses to rationalize its predictions. Experimental results show that the fine-tuned model not only predicts labels accurately but also provides reasoning by identifying polarity-related keywords or phrases to support its predictions. In addition, we contribute a new Khmer polarity dataset consisting of short- to medium-length casual, romanized, and mixed-code Khmer expressions. This dataset was constructed using both heuristic rules and human curation and is publicly available through a gated Hugging Face repository (rinabuoy/khmerpolarity_nonreasoning). The fine-tuned Qwen-3 models are also made available in the same Hugging Face account.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种可解释的柬埔寨语极性分类器，通过微调基于指令推理的Qwen-3模型，使其不仅能准确预测极性标签，还能提供支持预测的理由。同时，还贡献了一个新的柬埔寨语极性数据集。
AI.motivation: 现有的柬埔寨语极性分类模型通常只预测标签，但缺乏解释其预测背后的理由，这限制了模型的可信度和应用。
AI.method: 研究方法包括：1) 微调一个基于指令推理的Qwen-3模型，以实现自我解释能力，即模型能够解释其预测。2) 构建一个新的柬埔寨语极性数据集，该数据集包含短到中等长度的非正式、罗马化和混合编码的柬埔寨语表达，并结合启发式规则和人工整理。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，微调后的模型不仅能准确预测极性标签，还能通过识别与极性相关的关键词或短语来提供支持其预测的理由。此外，本文还贡献了一个新的公开可用的柬埔寨语极性数据集。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功提出了一种可解释的柬埔寨语极性分类器，该分类器通过微调Qwen-3模型实现了准确的预测和合理的解释。同时，所贡献的新数据集和模型将推动柬埔寨语自然语言处理领域的发展，特别是在可解释性方面。

title: POTSA: A Cross-Lingual Speech Alignment Framework for Low Resource Speech-to-Text Translation
summary: Speech Large Language Models (SpeechLLMs) have achieved breakthroughs in multilingual speech-to-text translation (S2TT). However, existing approaches often overlook semantic commonalities across source languages, leading to biased translation performance. In this work, we propose \textbf{POTSA} (Parallel Optimal Transport for Speech Alignment), a new framework based on cross-lingual parallel speech pairs and Optimal Transport (OT), designed to bridge high- and low-resource translation gaps. First, we introduce a Bias Compensation module to coarsely align initial speech representations across languages. Second, we impose token-level OT constraints on a Q-Former using parallel speech pairs to establish fine-grained consistency of representations. Then, we apply a layer scheduling strategy to focus OT constraints on the most semantically beneficial layers. Experiments on the FLEURS dataset show that our method achieves SOTA performance, with +0.93 BLEU on average over five common languages and +5.05 BLEU on zero-shot languages, using only 10 hours of parallel speech per source language.

AI.tldr: 本文提出POTSA框架，通过跨语言并行语音对和最优传输（OT）技术，解决语音大语言模型（SpeechLLMs）在多语言语音到文本翻译（S2TT）中存在的语义偏差和资源差距问题，显著提升了翻译性能。
AI.motivation: 现有语音大语言模型在多语言S2TT中常忽略源语言间的语义共性，导致翻译性能存在偏差，尤其在高资源和低资源语言之间存在翻译差距。
AI.method: 1. 引入偏差补偿模块对初始语音表示进行粗略跨语言对齐。2. 利用并行语音对，在Q-Former上施加token级最优传输（OT）约束，以实现表示的精细一致性。3. 应用层调度策略，将OT约束集中在语义最有利的层。
AI.result: 在FLEURS数据集上，该方法取得了SOTA性能，在五种常见语言上平均BLEU提升0.93，在零样本语言上BLEU提升5.05，且每种源语言仅使用10小时并行语音数据。
AI.conclusion: POTSA框架通过有效利用跨语言并行语音和最优传输，成功弥合了高低资源语言间的翻译差距，显著提升了多语言S2TT的性能，尤其在零样本翻译方面表现突出。

title: LiteraryTaste: A Preference Dataset for Creative Writing Personalization
summary: People have different creative writing preferences, and large language models (LLMs) for these tasks can benefit from adapting to each user's preferences. However, these models are often trained over a dataset that considers varying personal tastes as a monolith. To facilitate developing personalized creative writing LLMs, we introduce LiteraryTaste, a dataset of reading preferences from 60 people, where each person: 1) self-reported their reading habits and tastes (stated preference), and 2) annotated their preferences over 100 pairs of short creative writing texts (revealed preference). With our dataset, we found that: 1) people diverge on creative writing preferences, 2) finetuning a transformer encoder could achieve 75.8% and 67.7% accuracy when modeling personal and collective revealed preferences, and 3) stated preferences had limited utility in modeling revealed preferences. With an LLM-driven interpretability pipeline, we analyzed how people's preferences vary. We hope our work serves as a cornerstone for personalizing creative writing technologies.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了LiteraryTaste数据集，包含60人的阅读偏好数据，用于开发个性化的创意写作大型语言模型（LLMs）。研究发现人们的写作偏好存在差异，并证明微调Transformer编码器能有效建模个人和集体偏好，而口头偏好在建模中作用有限。
AI.motivation: 当前的LLMs在创意写作任务中未能适应用户的个性化偏好，因为它们通常在将多样化个人品味视为单一整体的数据集上进行训练。因此，需要一个能反映个体阅读偏好的数据集来促进个性化创意写作LLMs的开发。
AI.method: 研究构建了LiteraryTaste数据集，收集了60人的数据，每人：1) 自我报告阅读习惯和品味（口头偏好），以及 2) 对100对短篇创意写作文本进行偏好标注（揭示偏好）。接着，使用Transformer编码器进行微调，以建模个人和集体的揭示偏好。此外，还利用LLM驱动的可解释性流程分析了人们偏好的差异。
AI.result: 研究发现：1) 人们在创意写作偏好上存在显著差异；2) 微调Transformer编码器在建模个人和集体揭示偏好时分别达到了75.8%和67.7%的准确率；3) 口头偏好在建模揭示偏好方面的效用有限。通过LLM可解释性流程，分析了人们偏好变化的方式。
AI.conclusion: 本工作引入的LiteraryTaste数据集及其研究结果，为个性化创意写作技术奠定了基础，有望推动未来LLMs更好地适应个体用户的独特品味和需求。

title: AdaptDel: Adaptable Deletion Rate Randomized Smoothing for Certified Robustness
comment: 33 pages, 7 figures, camera ready version for NeurIPS 2025
summary: We consider the problem of certified robustness for sequence classification against edit distance perturbations. Naturally occurring inputs of varying lengths (e.g., sentences in natural language processing tasks) present a challenge to current methods that employ fixed-rate deletion mechanisms and lead to suboptimal performance. To this end, we introduce AdaptDel methods with adaptable deletion rates that dynamically adjust based on input properties. We extend the theoretical framework of randomized smoothing to variable-rate deletion, ensuring sound certification with respect to edit distance. We achieve strong empirical results in natural language tasks, observing up to 30 orders of magnitude improvement to median cardinality of the certified region, over state-of-the-art certifications.

AI.tldr: 本文针对序列分类在编辑距离扰动下的认证鲁棒性问题，提出了可变删除率的AdaptDel方法，显著提升了认证区域的鲁棒性。
AI.motivation: 现有方法采用固定删除率机制，在处理长度变化的输入（如自然语言处理中的句子）时表现不佳，导致次优性能。
AI.method: 引入了AdaptDel方法，其删除率可根据输入特性动态调整。将随机平滑的理论框架扩展到可变删除率，以确保对编辑距离的有效认证。
AI.result: 在自然语言任务中取得了显著的经验结果，认证区域的中位数基数比现有最先进的认证方法提高了多达30个数量级。
AI.conclusion: AdaptDel方法通过适应性删除率，有效解决了序列分类在编辑距离扰动下的认证鲁棒性问题，并大幅超越了现有技术水平。

title: MTQ-Eval: Multilingual Text Quality Evaluation for Language Models
summary: The use of large language models (LLMs) for evaluating outputs is becoming an increasingly effective and scalable approach. However, it remains uncertain whether this capability extends beyond task-specific evaluations to more general assessments of text quality, particularly in multilingual contexts. In this study, we introduce, MTQ-Eval, a novel framework for multilingual text quality evaluation that learns from examples of both high- and low-quality texts, adjusting its internal representations. To develop MTQ-Eval, we first automatically generate text quality preference data and then use it to train open-source base LLMs to align with ratings of high- and low-quality text. Our comprehensive evaluation across 115 languages demonstrates the improved performance of the proposed model. Upon further analysis, we find that this enhanced evaluation capability also leads to notable improvements in downstream tasks.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出MTQ-Eval框架，利用自动生成的偏好数据训练开源大型语言模型，以有效评估115种语言的文本质量，并在下游任务中表现出色。
AI.motivation: 尽管大型语言模型（LLMs）在任务特定评估中表现出色，但其在更普遍的文本质量评估（特别是在多语言背景下）中的能力仍不确定。
AI.method: 引入MTQ-Eval框架，通过自动生成高质量和低质量文本的偏好数据，并用这些数据训练开源基础LLMs，使其内部表示与文本质量评分对齐。
AI.result: MTQ-Eval模型在115种语言的综合评估中表现出显著的性能提升。进一步分析表明，这种增强的评估能力也带来了下游任务的显著改进。
AI.conclusion: MTQ-Eval框架成功地将LLMs的能力扩展到多语言文本质量的通用评估，并能有效提升相关下游任务的表现。

title: BronchOpt : Vision-Based Pose Optimization with Fine-Tuned Foundation Models for Accurate Bronchoscopy Navigation
summary: Accurate intra-operative localization of the bronchoscope tip relative to patient anatomy remains challenging due to respiratory motion, anatomical variability, and CT-to-body divergence that cause deformation and misalignment between intra-operative views and pre-operative CT. Existing vision-based methods often fail to generalize across domains and patients, leading to residual alignment errors. This work establishes a generalizable foundation for bronchoscopy navigation through a robust vision-based framework and a new synthetic benchmark dataset that enables standardized and reproducible evaluation. We propose a vision-based pose optimization framework for frame-wise 2D-3D registration between intra-operative endoscopic views and pre-operative CT anatomy. A fine-tuned modality- and domain-invariant encoder enables direct similarity computation between real endoscopic RGB frames and CT-rendered depth maps, while a differentiable rendering module iteratively refines camera poses through depth consistency. To enhance reproducibility, we introduce the first public synthetic benchmark dataset for bronchoscopy navigation, addressing the lack of paired CT-endoscopy data. Trained exclusively on synthetic data distinct from the benchmark, our model achieves an average translational error of 2.65 mm and a rotational error of 0.19 rad, demonstrating accurate and stable localization. Qualitative results on real patient data further confirm strong cross-domain generalization, achieving consistent frame-wise 2D-3D alignment without domain-specific adaptation. Overall, the proposed framework achieves robust, domain-invariant localization through iterative vision-based optimization, while the new benchmark provides a foundation for standardized progress in vision-based bronchoscopy navigation.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种鲁棒的基于视觉的支气管镜导航框架和一个新的合成基准数据集，通过2D-3D配准实现精确的术中定位，并展现出强大的跨域泛化能力。
AI.motivation: 由于呼吸运动、解剖变异性和CT与实际身体的偏差导致的变形和错位，术中支气管镜尖端相对于患者解剖结构的精确局部化仍然具有挑战性。现有的基于视觉的方法通常难以在不同领域和患者之间泛化，导致残余对齐误差。
AI.method: 本文提出了一个基于视觉的姿态优化框架，用于术中内窥镜视图与术前CT解剖结构之间的逐帧2D-3D配准。一个经过微调的模态和领域不变编码器能够直接计算真实内窥镜RGB帧与CT渲染深度图之间的相似性。一个可微分渲染模块通过深度一致性迭代优化相机姿态。此外，还引入了第一个用于支气管镜导航的公共合成基准数据集，以解决缺乏配对CT-内窥镜数据的问题。
AI.result: 模型仅在与基准数据集不同的合成数据上训练，实现了平均2.65毫米的平移误差和0.19弧度的旋转误差，证明了准确和稳定的定位。在真实患者数据上的定性结果进一步证实了强大的跨域泛化能力，无需特定领域适应即可实现一致的逐帧2D-3D对齐。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的框架通过迭代的基于视觉的优化实现了鲁棒、领域不变的定位，而新的基准数据集为基于视觉的支气管镜导航的标准化进展奠定了基础。

title: DreamPose3D: Hallucinative Diffusion with Prompt Learning for 3D Human Pose Estimation
summary: Accurate 3D human pose estimation remains a critical yet unresolved challenge, requiring both temporal coherence across frames and fine-grained modeling of joint relationships. However, most existing methods rely solely on geometric cues and predict each 3D pose independently, which limits their ability to resolve ambiguous motions and generalize to real-world scenarios. Inspired by how humans understand and anticipate motion, we introduce DreamPose3D, a diffusion-based framework that combines action-aware reasoning with temporal imagination for 3D pose estimation. DreamPose3D dynamically conditions the denoising process using task-relevant action prompts extracted from 2D pose sequences, capturing high-level intent. To model the structural relationships between joints effectively, we introduce a representation encoder that incorporates kinematic joint affinity into the attention mechanism. Finally, a hallucinative pose decoder predicts temporally coherent 3D pose sequences during training, simulating how humans mentally reconstruct motion trajectories to resolve ambiguity in perception. Extensive experiments on benchmarked Human3.6M and MPI-3DHP datasets demonstrate state-of-the-art performance across all metrics. To further validate DreamPose3D's robustness, we tested it on a broadcast baseball dataset, where it demonstrated strong performance despite ambiguous and noisy 2D inputs, effectively handling temporal consistency and intent-driven motion variations.

AI.tldr: DreamPose3D是一个基于扩散的框架，结合动作感知推理和时间想象力，实现了更准确和时间连贯的3D人体姿态估计，并在基准数据集和真实世界场景中表现出色。
AI.motivation: 现有的3D人体姿态估计方法主要依赖几何线索并独立预测每个3D姿态，这限制了它们解决模糊运动和泛化到真实世界场景的能力。研究受人类理解和预测运动方式的启发，旨在解决这些挑战。
AI.method: 引入DreamPose3D框架，该框架利用扩散模型，通过从2D姿态序列中提取任务相关的动作提示来动态调节去噪过程，以捕捉高级意图。此外，提出一个表示编码器，将运动学关节亲和力整合到注意力机制中，以有效建模关节间的结构关系。最后，一个幻觉姿态解码器在训练期间预测时间连贯的3D姿态序列，模拟人类心理重建运动轨迹以解决感知模糊性。
AI.result: 在Human3.6M和MPI-3DHP基准数据集上取得了所有指标的最新SOTA性能。在广播棒球数据集上，即使在模糊和嘈杂的2D输入下，也展现了强大的鲁棒性，有效处理了时间一致性和意图驱动的运动变化。
AI.conclusion: DreamPose3D通过结合动作感知推理和时间想象力，显著提高了3D人体姿态估计的准确性和鲁棒性，尤其在处理时间一致性和意图驱动的运动变化方面表现出色，为解决模糊运动和泛化到真实世界场景提供了有效方案。

title: Ultra-Light Test-Time Adaptation for Vision--Language Models
summary: Vision-Language Models (VLMs) such as CLIP achieve strong zero-shot recognition by comparing image embeddings to text-derived class prototypes. However, under domain shift, they suffer from feature drift, class-prior mismatch, and severe miscalibration. Existing test-time adaptation (TTA) methods often require backpropagation through large backbones, covariance estimation, or heavy memory/state, which is problematic for streaming and edge scenarios. We propose Ultra-Light Test-Time Adaptation (UL-TTA), a fully training-free and backprop-free framework that freezes the backbone and adapts only logit-level parameters: class prototypes, class priors, and temperature. UL-TTA performs an online EM-style procedure with (i) selective sample filtering to use only confident predictions, (ii) closed-form Bayesian updates for prototypes and priors anchored by text and Dirichlet priors, (iii) decoupled temperatures for prediction vs. calibration, and (iv) lightweight guards (norm clipping, prior KL constraints, smoothed temperature) to prevent drift in long streams. Across large-scale cross-domain and OOD benchmarks (PACS, Office-Home, DomainNet, Terra Incognita, ImageNet-R/A/V2/Sketch; ~726K test samples) and strong TTA baselines including Tent, T3A, CoTTA, SAR, Tip-Adapter, and FreeTTA, UL-TTA consistently improves top-1 accuracy (e.g., +4.7 points over zero-shot CLIP on average) while reducing ECE by 20-30%, with less than 8% latency overhead. Long-stream experiments up to 200K samples show no collapse. Our results demonstrate that logit-level Bayesian adaptation is sufficient to obtain state-of-the-art accuracy-calibration trade-offs for VLMs under domain shift, without updating any backbone parameters.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种超轻量级测试时自适应（UL-TTA）框架，用于解决视觉语言模型（VLM）在域偏移下的性能下降和校准问题。UL-TTA无需训练和反向传播，仅通过在线EM风格程序自适应调整logit级别的参数（类别原型、类别先验和温度），实现了卓越的准确性和校准性能，同时保持极低的计算开销。
AI.motivation: 视觉语言模型（如CLIP）在域偏移下会遭遇特征漂移、类别先验不匹配和严重校准不良问题。现有测试时自适应（TTA）方法通常需要对大型骨干网络进行反向传播、协方差估计或大量内存/状态，这对于流式和边缘计算场景来说是不可行的。
AI.method: 本文提出了Ultra-Light Test-Time Adaptation (UL-TTA)，一个完全无需训练和反向传播的框架。它冻结骨干网络，仅自适应调整logit级别的参数：类别原型、类别先验和温度。UL-TTA采用在线EM风格的程序，包括：(i) 选择性样本过滤，只使用置信预测；(ii) 对由文本和狄利克雷先验锚定的原型和先验进行闭式贝叶斯更新；(iii) 预测和校准采用解耦的温度；(iv) 轻量级防护措施（范数裁剪、先验KL约束、平滑温度）以防止在长流中漂移。
AI.result: UL-TTA在大型跨域和OOD基准测试中（PACS、Office-Home、DomainNet、Terra Incognita、ImageNet-R/A/V2/Sketch；约72.6万个测试样本）以及与Tent、T3A、CoTTA、SAR、Tip-Adapter和FreeTTA等强TTA基线对比中，持续提升了top-1准确率（例如，平均比零样本CLIP高4.7个百分点），同时将ECE降低了20-30%，而延迟开销不到8%。长流实验（高达20万个样本）显示没有性能崩溃。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果表明，logit级别的贝叶斯自适应足以在域偏移下为VLM提供最先进的准确性-校准权衡，而无需更新任何骨干网络参数。

title: Seer Self-Consistency: Advance Budget Estimation for Adaptive Test-Time Scaling
summary: Test-time scaling improves the inference performance of Large Language Models (LLMs) but also incurs substantial computational costs. Although recent studies have reduced token consumption through dynamic self-consistency, they remain constrained by the high latency of sequential requests. In this paper, we propose SeerSC, a dynamic self-consistency framework that simultaneously improves token efficiency and latency by integrating System 1 and System 2 reasoning. Specifically, we utilize the rapid System 1 to compute the answer entropy for given queries. This score is then used to evaluate the potential of samples for scaling, enabling dynamic self-consistency under System 2. Benefiting from the advance and accurate estimation provided by System 1, the proposed method can reduce token usage while simultaneously achieving a significant decrease in latency through parallel generation. It outperforms existing methods, achieving up to a 47% reduction in token consumption and a 43% reduction in inference latency without significant performance loss.

AI.tldr: SeerSC是一种动态自洽框架，它结合了System 1和System 2推理，显著降低了大型语言模型（LLM）测试时推理的token消耗和延迟，同时保持了性能。
AI.motivation: 测试时缩放（Test-time scaling）能提升LLM推理性能，但计算成本高昂。现有动态自洽方法虽然减少了token消耗，但仍受限于顺序请求带来的高延迟。
AI.method: SeerSC框架通过整合System 1和System 2推理来提高token效率和降低延迟。具体而言，它利用快速的System 1计算给定查询的答案熵，该分数用于评估样本进行缩放的潜力，从而在System 2下实现动态自洽。同时，通过并行生成显著减少了延迟。
AI.result: SeerSC超越现有方法，在不显著损失性能的情况下，实现了高达47%的token消耗减少和43%的推理延迟降低。
AI.conclusion: SeerSC通过结合System 1的快速估计和System 2的动态自洽，成功地在LLM测试时缩放中同时优化了token使用效率和推理延迟，提供了更高效的解决方案。

title: An ICTM-RMSAV Framework for Bias-Field Aware Image Segmentation under Poisson and Multiplicative Noise
summary: Image segmentation is a core task in image processing, yet many methods degrade when images are heavily corrupted by noise and exhibit intensity inhomogeneity. Within the iterative-convolution thresholding method (ICTM) framework, we propose a variational segmentation model that integrates denoising terms. Specifically, the denoising component consists of an I-divergence term and an adaptive total-variation (TV) regularizer, making the model well suited to images contaminated by Gamma--distributed multiplicative noise and Poisson noise. A spatially adaptive weight derived from a gray-level indicator guides diffusion differently across regions of varying intensity. To further address intensity inhomogeneity, we estimate a smoothly varying bias field, which improves segmentation accuracy. Regions are represented by characteristic functions, with contour length encoded accordingly. For efficient optimization, we couple ICTM with a relaxed modified scalar auxiliary variable (RMSAV) scheme. Extensive experiments on synthetic and real-world images with intensity inhomogeneity and diverse noise types show that the proposed model achieves superior accuracy and robustness compared with competing approaches.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种基于ICTM框架的变分图像分割模型，通过整合I-散度和自适应全变分去噪项以及偏置场估计，有效处理伽马乘性噪声、泊松噪声和强度不均匀性图像，并展示出优越的精度和鲁棒性。
AI.motivation: 在图像处理中，图像分割是一项核心任务，但现有许多方法在图像受到严重噪声污染和表现出强度不均匀性时性能会下降。
AI.method: 该研究提出一个在迭代卷积阈值法（ICTM）框架内的变分分割模型，其中去噪部分包含I-散度项和自适应全变分（TV）正则化器，适用于伽马乘性噪声和泊松噪声。模型采用由灰度指示器导出的空间自适应权重来引导不同强度区域的扩散，并通过估计平滑变化的偏置场来解决强度不均匀性。区域由特征函数表示，并编码轮廓长度。优化方面，将ICTM与松弛修正标量辅助变量（RMSAV）方案结合。
AI.result: 在具有强度不均匀性和多种噪声类型的合成图像和真实世界图像上进行的大量实验表明，所提出的模型与现有竞争方法相比，取得了卓越的准确性和鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: 该模型通过整合有效的去噪和强度不均匀性处理策略，在图像分割任务中展现出优越的性能，尤其适用于受严重噪声和强度不均匀性影响的图像。

title: PIFF: A Physics-Informed Generative Flow Model for Real-Time Flood Depth Mapping
summary: Flood mapping is crucial for assessing and mitigating flood impacts, yet traditional methods like numerical modeling and aerial photography face limitations in efficiency and reliability. To address these challenges, we propose PIFF, a physics-informed, flow-based generative neural network for near real-time flood depth estimation.
